summary: I RECENTLY PURCHASED A NEW 2008 SUZUKI SV650 STANDARD MOTORCYCLE.  THE INCIDENT HAPPENED RIGHT BEFORE I ENTERED THE FREEWAY.  THE SCREW SECURING THE LEFT FOOT GEAR SHIFTER BECAME LOOSE AND FELL OFF.  THIS IS A SERIOUS HAZARD SINCE MOTORCYCLE HAD ONLY 600 MILES WHEN IT HAPPENED.  I COULD HAVE STALLED OR LOST CONTROL IF I ENTERED THE FREEWAY.  *TR
